Resources.Source: What would you like to do next?

Resources.Translation: stolpec {0} je vrnil tip {1}, pričakovan je tip {2}

Resources.Source: There are one or more problems on this page. Additional information is displayed in each section with a problem.
Resources.Translation: Na strani je prišlo do ene ali več težav. Dodatne informacije so prikazane v vsakem odseku s težavo.

Resources.Source: An error occurred. More information may be available in the server event log.
Resources.Translation: Prišlo je do napake. Dodatne informacije so morda na voljo v dnevniku dogodkov strežnika.

Resources.Source: Invalid database name "{0}". Database names may only contain letters, digits, and underscores.
Resources.Translation: Neveljavno ime zbirke podatkov »{0}«. Imena zbirk podatkov lahko vsebujejo samo črke, številke in podčrtaje.

Resources.Source: The assignment must have a title.
The value ({0}) is not valid for the {1} parameter.
Use this page to complete and submit your assignment.
Resources.Translation: Uporabite to stran, če želite izpolniti in oddati nalogo.

Resources.Source: Enter grades and comments for individual learners. When you're done, click Save or OK. To exit without saving, click Cancel.
Resources.Translation: Vnesite ocene in komentarje za posamezne slušatelje. Ko končate, kliknite »Shrani«. Če želite okno zapreti brez shranjevanja, kliknite »Zapri«.

Resources.Source: Display only assignments for this site instead of all assignments in the database.
Resources.Translation: Prikaži samo naloge za to mesto in ne vse naloge v zbirki podatkov.

Resources.Source: Once you mark an assignment as complete, you will no longer be able to work on it.
Resources.Translation: Ko nalogo označite kot dokončano, na njej ne boste mogli več delati.

Resources.Source: Allows the learner to re-do the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Omogoča, da slušatelj znova naredi nalogo.

Resources.Source: You cannot perform this operation because you are not an instructor on this site ({0}).
Resources.Translation: Te operacije ne morete izvesti, ker niste predavatelj na mestu ({0}).

Resources.Source: Assign the learning resource to learners on site: {0}
Resources.Translation: Dodeli učni vir slušateljem na mestu: {0}

Resources.Source: Deleting an assignment will delete all the associated learner data, including learner work and grades for the assignment. You cannot recover deleted information.
Resources.Translation: Brisanje naloge bo izbrisalo vse podatke, povezane s slušateljem, vključno z njegovim delom in ocenami za nalogo. Izbrisanih informacij ni mogoče obnoviti.

Resources.Source: You cannot grade the assignment because you are not an instructor for it.
Resources.Translation: Naloge ne morete oceniti, ker niste predavatelj zanjo.

Resources.Source: at most one of value and macroName arguments can be non-null
Resources.Translation: največ ena od vrednosti in argumentov »macroName« ima lahko vrednost, ki ni ničelna

Resources.Source: Correct answers are shown to the learner when the assignment is returned (Class Server content only).
Resources.Translation: Pravilni odgovori so slušatelju prikazani ob vrnitvi naloge (samo vsebina Class Server)

Resources.Source: RenderAs="UtcAsLocalDateTime" but ViewColumnName specifies a non-date/time column
Resources.Translation: RenderAs="UtcAsLocalDateTime", vendar pa ViewColumnName navaja stolpec, ki ne vsebuje datuma ali časa

Resources.Source: You previously cleared the final score for this learner. Click OK to overwrite the blank score with the new score of {0}. Click Cancel to leave the final score blank.
Resources.Translation: Končni rezultat tega slušatelja ste že počistili. Kliknite »V redu«, če želite prazen rezultat prepisati z novim rezultatom {0}. Kliknite »Prekliči«, če želite končni rezultat pustiti prazen.

Resources.Source: The assignment (ID {0}) does not exist or you may not have permission to access it.
Resources.Translation: Naloga (ID {0}) ne obstaja ali pa nimate dovoljenja za dostop do nje.

Resources.Source: This page helps you edit an assignment’s properties or change instructors or learners for the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Ta stran vam pomaga urediti lastnosti naloge ali spremeniti predavatelje ali slušatelje za nalogo.

Resources.Source: value and macroName arguments must be null if oper is "IsNotNull"
Resources.Translation: argumenta value in macroName morata imeti ničelni vrednosti, če ima oper vrednost »IsNotNull«

Resources.Source: The document library ({0}) does not have versioning turned on or the number of versions is limited. Editing this learning resource after you assign it could cause unpredictable results.
Resources.Translation: Knjižnica dokumentov ({0}) nima vključenega sledenje različic ali pa je število različic omejeno. Urejanje učnega vira po dodelitvi lahko povzroči nepričakovane rezultate.

Resources.Source:
Specify the SLK database that will contain e-learning assignments for the selected site collection.

  • Multiple site collections can share the same SLK database. To use an existing SLK database, enter the server and database name.
  • To create a new database, enter an existing database server and a new database name, and select Create a new database.
Resources.Translation:
Navedite zbirko podatkov SLK-ja, ki bo vsebovala naloge e-učenja za izbrano zbirko mest.

  • Več zbirk mest si lahko deli isto zbirko podatkov SLK-ja. Če želite uporabljati obstoječo zbirko podatkov SLK-ja, vnesite ime strežnika in zbirke podatkov.
  • Če želite ustvariti novo zbirko podatkov, vnesite ime obstoječega strežnika in ime nove zbirke podatkov ter izberite Ustvari novo zbirko podatkov.

Resources.Source: Open site in a new window
The assignment (ID {0}) does not exist or you may not have permission to access it.
Resources.Translation: Naloga (ID {0}) ne obstaja ali pa nimate dovoljenja za dostop do nje.

Resources.Source: The learning resource is not valid. {0}

Specify the SharePoint permissions that will identify instructors and learners in SLK.

  • To use existing SharePoint permissions to identify instructors and learners, enter the permission names; for example, "Contribute" and "Read".
  • To create new permissions, enter the permission names and select Create permissions.

Recommended  Create "SLK Instructor" and "SLK Learner" permissions for new installations.
Resources.Translation:
Navedite SharePointova dovoljenja, ki bodo določala predavatelje in slušatelje v kompletu SLK.

  • Če želite uporabljati obstoječa SharePointova dovoljenja za prepoznavanje predavateljev in slušateljev, vnesite imena dovoljenj, na primer »Prispevanje« in »Branje«.
  • Če želite ustvariti nova dovoljenja, vnesite imena dovoljenj in izberite Ustvari dovoljenja.

Priporočeno  Za nove namestitve ustvarite dovoljenji »Predavatelj za SLK« in »Slušatelj za SLK«.

Resources.Source: Returns the assignment to the learner for review
There are no learners on this site.
SharePoint Learning Kit is not configured correctly -- please contact your system administrator. (SLK Settings not found for SPSite GUID {0}.)
Resources.Translation: SharePoint Learning Kit ni konfiguriran pravilno – obrnite se na skrbnika sistema. (Nastavitev SLK-ja za GUID {0} mesta SPSite ni mogoče najti.)

Resources.Source: Choose the site where you'd like to assign this learning resource:
Resources.Translation: Izberite mesto, ki mu želite dodeliti ta učni vir.

Resources.Source: LearnerAssignment is in the wrong state or doesn't have a valid attempt for this operation
Resources.Translation: LearnerAssignment je v napačnem stanju ali pa nima pravilnega poskusa za to operacijo

Resources.Source: The assignment will be returned to the learner automatically.
The e-learning package with identifier {0} does not exist or is inaccessible
Resources.Translation: Paket za e-učenje z identifikatorjem {0} ne obstaja ali pa dostop do njega ni mogoč

Resources.Source: This Web site is not accessible.
Resources.Translation: Dostop do tega spletnega mesta ni mogoč.

Resources.Source: The {0} parameter is missing or empty.
Error creating one or more users in site collection "{0}": {1}
Resources.Translation: Napaka pri ustvarjanju enega ali več uporabnikov v zbirki mest »{0}«: {1}

Resources.Source: The site ({0}) is already in your list. Click the (show all sites) link to see your entire list.
Resources.Translation: Mesto ({0}) je že na seznamu. Kliknite povezavo (pokaži vsa mesta), če si želite ogledati celoten seznam.

Resources.Source: The learner has not submitted the assignment. To assign a grade, you must collect it.
Resources.Translation: Slušatelj še ni oddal naloge. Če želite nalogo oceniti, jo morate pobrati.

Resources.Source: Invalid database server name "{0}". Server names may only contain letters, digits, and underscores.
Resources.Translation: Neveljavno ime strežnika z zbirko podatkov »{0}«. Imena strežnikov lahko vsebujejo samo črke, številke in podčrtaje.

Resources.Source: You must type a Web address to add a site to your site list.
Resources.Translation: Če želite mesto dodati na seznam, morate vnesti spletni naslov.

Resources.Source: The learning resource does not exist or you may not have permission to access it.
Resources.Translation: Učni vir ne obstaja ali pa nimate dovoljenja za dostop do njega.

Resources.Source: The learning resource is a draft. If you assign it, learners may lose access to it once it is published or approved.
Resources.Translation: Učni vir je osnutek. Če ga dodelite, bodo slušatelji morda izgubili dostop do njega, ko bo objavljen ali odobren.

Resources.Source: The score must be a number.
You cannot assign the learning resource because it is currently checked out to you. You must check it in before assigning it.
Resources.Translation: Učnega vira ni mogoče dodeliti, ker je trenutno rezerviran za vas. Pred dodelitvijo ga morate sprostiti.

Resources.Source: Assign this learning resource to yourself.
The current assignment status does not allow the requested action.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno stanje dodelitve ne dovoljuje zahtevanega dejanja.

Resources.Source: Domain group enumeration failed for path "{0}"
Resources.Translation: Oštevilčevanje domenske skupine za pot »{0}« ni uspelo

Resources.Source: Click here to download the default SLK Settings file used in new installations
Resources.Translation: Kliknite tukaj, če želite prenesti privzeto datoteko z nastavitvami SLK-ja, ki se uporablja za nove namestitve

Resources.Source: Use this web part to keep track of your SharePoint Learning Kit assignments.
Resources.Translation: Uporabite ta spletni gradnik, če želite slediti nalogam kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit.

Resources.Source: Query or query set to display for all users instead of the default. For example, "LearnerQuerySet" or "InstructorQuerySet".
Resources.Translation: Poizvedba ali nabor poizvedb, ki naj bodo prikazan za vse uporabnike namesto privzetega. Na primer »NaborPoizvedbSlušatelja« ali »NaborPoizvedbPredavatelja«.

Resources.Source: This site is not configured to use SharePoint Learning Kit. Administrators can use SharePoint Central Administration to configure SharePoint Learning Kit.
Resources.Translation: Mesto ni konfigurirano za uporabo kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit. Skrbniki lahko uporabijo SharePointovo osrednje skrbništvo za konfiguracijo kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit.

Resources.Source: The assignment must have at least one instructor.
Resources.Translation: Naloga mora imeti vsaj enega predavatelja.

Resources.Source: You cannot assign to the site ({0}) because you are not an instructor on that site.
Resources.Translation: Mestu ({0}) ne morete dodeljevati, ker na njem niste predavatelj.

Resources.Source:
{0}
More information has been written to the server event log.
Resources.Translation:
{0}
Dodatne informacije so bile zapisane v dnevnik dogodkov strežnika.

Resources.Source: The server is currently busy. Please retry your operation.
Resources.Translation: Strežnik je trenutno zaseden. Znova poskusite z operacijo.

Resources.Source: All learner assignments will be returned to the learners. If you have not graded all the assignments, some learners may receive zero points.
Resources.Translation: Vse naloge slušateljev bodo samodejno vrnjene slušateljem. Če niste ocenili vseh nalog, bodo nekateri slušatelji morda prejeli nič točk.

Resources.Source: Select a Site Collection to configure.
Resources.Translation: Izberite zbirko mest, ki jo želite konfigurirati.

Resources.Source: Choose instructors and learners for the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Izberite predavatelje in slušatelje za nalogo.

Resources.Source: The site ({0}) is not a valid site on this installation of SharePoint, or you may not have permission to access it.
Resources.Translation: Mesto ({0}) ni veljavno za to namestitev SharePointa ali pa nimate dovoljenja za dostop do tega mesta.

Resources.Source: If you uncheck yourself you will no longer be able to grade this assignment, or have access to this assignment’s properties.
Resources.Translation: Če se odznačite, naloge ne boste mogli več oceniti in ne boste imeli več dostopa do njenih lastnosti.

Resources.Source: This assignment has been submitted as complete. You cannot make any further changes.
Resources.Translation: Naloga je bila oddana kot dokončana. Nadaljnjih sprememb ne morete narediti.

Resources.Source: An error occurred. More information may be available in the server event log.
Resources.Translation: Prišlo je do napake. Dodatne informacije so morda na voljo v dnevniku dogodkov strežnika.

Resources.Source:
This assignment is not available.

This may be because:
  • The assignment does not exist.
  • You are accessing an assignment prior to its start date.
  • You do not have access to the requested view of the assignment.
More information may be available in the server event log.
Resources.Translation:
Naloga ni na voljo.

Razlog za to je lahko:
  • Naloga ne obstaja.
  • Poskušate pridobiti dostop do naloge pred njenim datumom začetka.
  • Nimate dostopa do zahtevanega pogleda naloge.
Dodatne informacije so morda na voljo v dnevniku dogodkov strežnika.

Resources.Source: You cannot review this assignment until it has been started by the learner.
Resources.Translation: Naloge ne morete pregledati, preden je slušatelj ni začel reševati.

Resources.Source: You cannot review this assignment until it has been returned.
Resources.Translation: Naloge ni mogoče pregledati, dokler ni bila vrnjena.

Resources.Source: Changes to this page will no longer be reflected in the grading page when you close this window. To fix this, save your changes and re-open the assignment from the grading page.
Resources.Translation: Spremembe na tej strani ne bodo več vidne na strani za ocenjevanje, ko zaprete okno. To popravite tako, da shranite spremembe in znova odprete nalogo na strani za ocenjevanje.

Resources.Source: You must sign in to access this assignment.
Resources.Translation: Če želite dostop do te naloge, se morate vpisati.

Resources.Source:
The attached files listed below are not allowed file types.

Invalid files:
Resources.Translation:
Priložene datoteke, ki so naštete spodaj, so vrste datotek, ki niso dovoljene.

Neveljavne datoteke:

Resources.Source:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this assignment.

If you have completed the assignment, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the assignment, click Cancel to return to the previous page.
Resources.Translation:
Ko oddate to nalogo, je ne boste mogli več spreminjati.

Če ste nalogo dokončali, kliknite Oddaj.

Če naloge še ne želite oddati, kliknite Prekliči, če se želite vrniti na prejšnjo stran.

Resources.Source: The assignment cannot be displayed. Try refreshing your browser.
Resources.Translation: Naloge ni mogoče prikazati. Poskusite osvežiti brskalnik.

Resources.Source: Select an activity to continue with the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Izberite dejavnost, če želite nadaljevati z nalogo.

Resources.Source:
The attached files listed below are empty or do not exist.

Invalid files:
Resources.Translation:
Priložene datoteke, ki so naštete spodaj, so prazne ali pa ne obstajajo.

Neveljavne datoteke:

Resources.Source: This grading session is finished. You can return to this assignment later to add or change grading information.
Resources.Translation: Ocenjevanje je končano. Na nalogo se lahko vrnete pozneje, če želite dodati ali spremeniti informacije o ocenjevanju.

Resources.Source: This assignment has been suspended. You can return later to resume the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Naloga je bila začasno zaustavljena. Vrnete se lahko kasneje in jo nadaljujete.

Resources.Source: This assignment has been completed. You cannot make any further changes.
Resources.Translation: Naloga je bila dokončana. Nadaljnjih sprememb ne morete narediti.

Resources.Source: The version of the learning resource assigned for this assignment cannot be found because it has been deleted or modified.
Resources.Translation: Različice učnega vira, ki je bila dodeljena tej nalogi, ni mogoče najti, ker je bila izbrisana ali spremenjena.

Resources.Source: You cannot navigate to the previous page at this time. Click Continue to return to the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno ne morete krmariti na prejšnjo stran. Če se želite vrniti na nalogo, kliknite »Nadaljuj«.

Resources.Source:
All grading changes have been saved.

Click Finish to end this grading session. You can return to this assignment later to add or change grading information.

If you are not ready to finish grading, click Cancel to return to the previous page.
Resources.Translation:
Vse spremembe ocenjevanja so bile shranjene.

Kliknite Dokončaj, če želite končati ocenjevanje. Na nalogo se lahko vrnete pozneje, če želite dodati ali spremeniti informacije o ocenjevanju.

Če ocenjevanja še ne želite končati, kliknite Prekliči za vrnitev na prejšnjo stran.

Resources.Source: The requested document could not be found.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevanega dokumenta ni bilo mogoče najti.

Resources.Source: Administrators can change the file attachment settings in SharePoint Central Administration by modifying the SharePoint Learning Kit settings file.
Resources.Translation: Skrbniki lahko nastavitve datotečnih prilog v SharePointovem osrednjem skrbništvu spremenijo tako, da spremenijo datoteko z nastavitvami kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit.

Resources.Source:
This assignment is not available because it has been submitted as complete.

You can review this assignment after it is returned by your instructor.
Resources.Translation:
Naloga ni na voljo, ker je bila oddana kot dokončana.

Nalogo lahko pregledate, ko vam jo vrne predavatelj.

Resources.Source: The available session does not match the request view of the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Razpoložljiva seja se ne ujema s pogledom za zahtevo naloge.

Resources.Source: You cannot navigate to the selected activity at this time. Click Continue to return to the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno ne morete krmariti na izbrano dejavnost. Če se želite vrniti na nalogo, kliknite »Nadaljuj«.

Resources.Source:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this assignment.

If you have completed the assignment, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the assignment, select an activity to continue the assignment.
Resources.Translation:
Ko oddate to nalogo, je ne boste mogli več spreminjati.

Če ste nalogo dokončali, kliknite Oddaj.

Če naloge še ne želite oddati, izberite dejavnost, s katero želite nadaljevati nalogo.

Resources.Source: The assignment has been abandoned. You cannot make any further changes.
Resources.Translation: Naloga je bila opuščena. Nadaljnjih sprememb ne morete narediti.

Resources.Source: You cannot navigate to the next page at this time. Click Continue to return to the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno ne morete krmariti na naslednjo stran. Če se želite vrniti na nalogo, kliknite »Nadaljuj«.

Resources.Source:
You cannot grade this assignment until it has been submitted.

To enable grading, you can collect the assignment or have the learner submit the assignment.
Resources.Translation:
Naloge ni mogoče oceniti, dokler ni bila oddana.

Če želite ocenjevanje omogočiti, morate nalogo pobrati ali pa vam jo mora slušatelj oddati.

Resources.Source:
The attached files listed below are larger than the allowed limit of {0} KB. Reduce the size of these files and try again.

Invalid files:
Resources.Translation:
Priložene datoteke, ki so naštete spodaj, so večje od dovoljene omejitve {0} kB. Zmanjšajte velikost teh datotek in poskusite znova.

Neveljavne datoteke:
